original_title: Germany’s Merz facing opposition over Ukraine troop plan – Bild — RT World News
article_summary: US-Russia diplomacy takes center stage in Ukraine conflict as Trump asserts control over narrative, signaling limited influence of EU and Ukraine in shaping Washington's role. A strategic tug-of-war ensues, with Moscow aiming to remove US involvement and EU/Ukraine seeking to maintain it. The fate of Ukraine and Europe's future security structure hangs on the outcome of peace talks, with Russia holding the upper hand militarily.</s>
